Text: I made it convenient to get these files without having to manually download each of the exe's and rename them, thereby simplifying the download process and also making it quicker as I have put all of the files into a single zip file.  Enjoy!!!!!!!

Well, neither of the two anti-virus or the two anti-spyware (all commercial versions) picked up anything when I downloaded this torrent to begin with. So all I did was to rename all of the add-on exe's to their proper name and zipped the file.  I did the tedious job so the rest of you wouldn't have to.
